problem.markdown:
1. A Molding is a process in which…. (x) Mold is filled with a liquid and hardens ( ) Mold is filled with a solid and liquefied ( ) Mold is unfilled with a liquid and does nothing ( ) Mold is filled with a gas and vaporize
2. Blow molding is a process in which only.. ( ) Solid plastic parts are formed (x) Only hollow plastic parts are formed ( ) Only thin plastic sheets are formed ( ) Is not a plastic molding process
3. Molds of Injection molding is made from (x) Tool steel ( ) Stainless steel ( ) Aluminum ( ) All of above
4. In casting process molds are made up of (x) Sand ( ) Steel ( ) Wood ( ) All of above
5. In Rubber compound molding ( ) Only Silicon compound is used ( ) Only Rubber compound is used ( ) Only Urethane compound is used (x) Both Rubber and urethane compound is used
problem.p: 1. A Molding is a process in which….

choicegroup.choice: Mold is filled with a liquid and hardens
Mold is filled with a solid and liquefied
Mold is unfilled with a liquid and does nothing
Mold is filled with a gas and vaporize

problem.p: 2. Blow molding is a process in which only..

choicegroup.choice: Only hollow plastic parts are formed
Only thin plastic sheets are formed
Is not a plastic molding process

problem.p: 3. Molds of Injection molding is made from
4. In casting process molds are made up of

choicegroup.choice: Both Rubber and urethane compound is used
